SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into template (introductionId, isFree, showModuleType, type, salePrice) values (#{introductionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isfree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showmoduletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update template set introductionId = #{introductionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isFree = #{isfree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, showModuleType = #{showmoduletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salePrice = #{saleprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, introductionId, isFree, showModuleType, type, salePrice from template
